questions.quote: Well, you know Jake, you should learn to use them. Like the way I'm talking right now, I would put an exclamation points at the end of all these sentences! On this one! And on that one!
Elaine? Guess what. I've decided to Form a Charitable Foundation, in Susie's honor. And as Susie's best friend, I want you to be involved.
No!!! The reason he's the iron man is because he goes out there and plays every game. Wash!!! Spin!!! Rinse!!! Spin!!! You take that away from him, you break his spirit!
Look Ramon, you're, you're a nice guy. But I, I actually only have three friends. I really can't handle any more.
He went crazy from one note. He couldn't get it out of his head. I think it was an A. He kept repeating it over and over again. He had to be institutionalized.
I tell you. If you were hitch-hiking, you'd never get into a car with someone with a hairdo like that.
Yeah, alright, fine.  You sit there and you watch while Newman takes over the world.  But he'd be a horrible leader.  And you know who's gonna suffer?  The little people; you and George.
Ohh boy. Well, I gotta meet Elaine and run some errands. So..
No, it's nice to meet you. Well, I'm outta here, see you guys.
Excuse me.  Doris would like to borrow red your pocketbook to go with her shoes.  The shoes have to match the pocketbook.  What's she doing? Yoga?
